rules_text:
Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put any number of land cards revealed this way into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
Flashback {1}{G}{U}{R} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
notes:
2k17
Instant > Sorcery
Flashback 1URG > Flashback 2URG

fluffy: library, then put —> library. Put (Nissa, Nature’s Artisan)
